Name: Voltage High Society
About the game: ENTER. EVOLVE. ESCAPE. In this cyberpunk-bodyhorror-metroidvania, you are a nameless prisoner thrown into an island ruled by cybernetic monsters. Fight your way through the horrors, gain new weapons and abilities, and look for a way out. Inspired by japanese cyberpunk and Escape from New York, featuring gritty retro graphics with modern touches. DISCOVER NEW WEAPONS, ABILITIES & LOCATIONS In true Metroidvania-style, the tools you acquire will grant you access to new areas, ways to fight your enemies, and solve puzzles. FIGHT CYBERNETIC HORRORS Fast-paced and unique combat. As you roam around the levels you'll constantly run into new monster designs to keep you on your toes. And, instead of having firearms, youÂ´ll do more than just aim & shoot at things. GRITTY RETRO AESTHETICS Combining both modern & old school tech, black & white visuals and vibrant colors, you'll always have surprises ahead. One area might be dark and gritty with menacing monsters, the other a parade of colours with fast-paced arcade combat.
